altername_name: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED: Federation vs. Z.A.F.T. Portable
name: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED: Rengou vs. Z.A.F.T. Portable
overview: Gundam Seed: Rengou vs. Z.A.F.T. Portable is a Simulation game, developed by Capcom and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2007.
